data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Ptomaphagus Hellwig (Coleoptera, Leiodidae, Cholevinae) from the Russian Far East and the Korean Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Cheng-Bin, Ruzicka, Jan, Perreau, Michel, Nishikawa, Masaaki, Park, Sun-Jae (2016): Revision of the genus Ptomaphagus Hellwig (Coleoptera, Leiodidae, Cholevinae) from the Russian Far East and the Korean Peninsula. ZooKeys 637: 33-45, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.637.9384, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.637.9384
